Not worth it at all. Paid 500‚Çπ just to end up eating curd rice for the night .
Went here last night, got a table for 3.
The service was extremely poor and slow .
The waiter.. brought "warm" water bottle on a summer day .. first dropped water on us while pouring water into glass .. asked for cold water .. he came back only after 3 reminders.
He was the only one around .. wearing a CSK T shirt.
When the starters started arriving I was shocked
The starters were extremely spicy and contained extreme amounts of garlic. Un bearable.
For a person who has stayed in Hyderabad all my life .. the waiter gives an explanation that this is how Hyderabadi food tastes.
Mushroom wasn't good ..spicy and nothing less.
Fish wasn't cooked
Chicken was toooo spicy
Crispy corn .. basic item.. was oily and under cooked.
Potato Cooked with its skin was again oily and totally bad
Panner didn't arrive at all
Water arrived
Left all food as it is on the plate and went got main course...
Biryani tasted like a spicy pulihora
Settled for curd rice
Icecream- asked for a butterscotch icecream with some "gems"
Icecream was good but The gems were tasting like synthetic chocolate.. horrible .. had to spit in the plate and leave in a hurry
When I was about to leave the panner starter arrived .. I had a bite .. it was ok
But I had enough already
Everyone around my table were complaining too..
But no use ..
Useless place
Never again

I went in team dinner there on 10th may .the worst part is they don‚Äôt have anything in main course except veg/non-veg biryani .

Only the staff behaviour was polite 
Apart from this it‚Äôs not a standard restaurant at all .

We went 3B's for team lunch. we have waited for long time for food. Food was average in taste wise. Limited number of items in buffet. Not satisfied with main menu. Desserts also limited items. staff not serving properly what we have asked. But pan and mango ice cream was superb. The place is very small and conjusted. Not a good place for team lunch.

But the food felt really stale and cold.
The chicken tikka was really bland and it felt like they were just warming the food from a very long time. Ambiance was a solid 2. Their staff is well behaved and very polite.
Had a very nice experience at 3bs gochibowli with gobind bro. Everything is really superb. We enjoyed ta food and service also. It's a nice dining restaurant in Hyderabad. We loved this place.
The food is very tasty and service is also excellent. Here Govind is very friendly, energetic and serves with love . It's a very nice place for celebrating anything.

You can call it a chota AB‚Äôs. It was a good place with friends. I have gone for a team dinner with some affordable prize and found 3B‚Äôs suitable. Service was a bit slow as we have keep on repeating what we want. Still we had a good time.

It was an absolute delight to visit this place. For starters, being a North Indian, I absolutely digged the Punjabi tracks that played for the entire evening. Kudos! Coming to food: The menu was pretty limited and the service of food was slow but that didn't stop them from overloading us with literally every dish. The quality and taste were both up to the mark. I absolutely loved the hospitality. The staff was really courteous and actually enjoyed serving us and made us eat more than we wanted. The crispy corn and Grilled pineapple were a total delight. The price was very decent for the quality and ambience and ideal to have a small gathering. The mocktails/cocktails were good too. All in all, a memorable experience. Looking forward to visiting again. Cheers!
One of the best place in hyderabad, we like the starters main course and desserts. Service is excellent all staff are very nice.thanks to making our day special.
Not enough variety, In main course and desserts. They fill you up with starters and when u are almost full then ask on the preferred spice level.
Been here for a team dinner, good place with a courteous staff. Buffet was good, chicken starter was soft and juicy. Baring that the food was okay.

A small place but very lively place, food is awesome, and the chef has the concern of taking review of food in between and he does make changes to it if needed, really appreciate their hard work in providing best quality.
